poems.title: A Summer Day
poems.author: Public Domain
poems.content: The golden sun, the lazy breeze, the meadow hums with bees.

poems.title: Evening by the Lake
poems.author: Public Domain
poems.content: Soft ripples kiss the shore, shadows lengthen, and the swallows soar.

poems.title: Midsummer Night
poems.author: Public Domain
poems.content: Fireflies stitch the dusk with light; the world exhales into the night.
